description: KM: Find Connections and Sessions Connected to SQL Server
body:
SELECT DISTINCT
    S.host_name
   ,C.client_net_address
   ,S.program_name
   ,S.login_name
   ,S.nt_domain
   ,S.nt_user_name
   ,S.client_interface_name
   ,TransactionIsolationLevel = CASE S.transaction_isolation_level
                                    WHEN 0 THEN 'Unspecified (0)'
                                    WHEN 1 THEN 'ReadUncommitted (1)'
                                    WHEN 2 THEN 'ReadCommitted (2)'
                                    WHEN 3 THEN 'RepeatableRead (3)'
                                    WHEN 4 THEN 'Serializable (4)'
                                    WHEN 5 THEN 'Snapshot (5)'
                                    ELSE 'UNKNOWN (' + CAST(S.transaction_isolation_level AS varchar(10)) + ')'
                                END
   ,DatabaseName              = D.name
FROM
    sys.dm_exec_sessions          AS S
INNER JOIN sys.databases          AS D ON S.database_id = D.database_id
LEFT JOIN sys.dm_exec_connections AS C ON C.session_id  = S.session_id
WHERE
    S.login_name NOT IN (N'sa')
AND S.program_name NOT IN (N'SQLServerCEIP')
AND S.program_name NOT LIKE N'SQLAgent - %'
ORDER BY
    S.login_name ASC;
